channel.title: Ban stuff
channel.description:
Make it so that banned members show up. What I mean by this is you know how you get watched tags and so forth? Make a banned tag.
Make a list so we can see whos been banned, would be nice to know whos been banned and whos left on their own accord.

item.title: Ban stuff
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Marking this as resolved. Thanks for the suggestion. If you feel it’s still needed later on, feel free to repost it and we’ll discuss it again.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban stuff
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

mopman_sucks:

because you are asking for more bandwidth usage and further database query’s and providing absolutely no benefits for adding such a pointless feature.

  1. You should have said that at the start? 2. their not pointless features and saying that you think their pointless to me is clearly confrontational/rude.
Taharok:

Well beyond that, SMF doesn’t work like vb in that it can just append (Banned) to the end of members’ names. There may be a mod for it, but either way, there are times when we don’t want members to know a certain member is banned. It’s not common, but it does happen. It’s essentially a privacy issue, if nothing else.

Ah right ;o. Yeah, he isn’t for it anyways because apparently he said that it’d be bad because it’d turn into a troll thread (or something). Sorry, I’m a bit confused to why you wouldn’t want anyone to know if a user is banned? I’m a bit confused by your last statements but I can see how its more hastle than its worth.
Feel free to delete this thread or whatever you do to declined threads ;p.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban stuff
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Well beyond that, SMF doesn’t work like vb in that it can just append (Banned) to the end of members’ names. There may be a mod for it, but either way, there are times when we don’t want members to know a certain member is banned. It’s not common, but it does happen. It’s essentially a privacy issue, if nothing else.

item.title: Ban stuff
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Do I even need to justify this, for the second thing someone said Frell agreed but didn’t suggest it cause he said it’d become a troll session. Just approve the post and see if it gets support or not :S. If it doesn’t don’t, if it does then do it.

Face palm, don’t see why your opinion overrides letting other people see it.

Read full topic

what does it matter? if they are banned or have just left the site they still arn’t here.
